titles: The reigne of King Henry the Second written in seaven bookes. By his Majesties command.
author: May, Thomas, 1595-1650.
Vaughan, Robert, engraver.
publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[atthewes and John Beale] for Benjamin Fisher, dwelling in Aldersgate-streete at the signe of the Talbot,
notes: The portrait is signed: RVaughan fecit.
The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
"The description of King Henry the Second, with a short survey of the changes in his reigne", N1-O1; "The single, and comparative characters of Henry the sonne, and Richard", O3-7; both in prose.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Henry --  II, --  King of England, 1133-1189 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
Great Britain --  History --  Henry II, 1133-1189 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
